title: Avery Clear Laminating Sheets, 9" x 12", Permanent Self-Adhesive, 2 Sheets (73602)
description: Easily, quickly and inexpensively laminate important documents, precious photos, valuable cards and more using these clear self-laminating sheets. Each 9" x 12" laminate sheet is coated with permanent self-adhesive so you can effortlessly create professional quality laminations without having to fuss with lamination machines. Laminating is simple: use the included grid to size the document, place the document on the adhesive side of a laminating sheet, lay the second sheet with its adhesive side down to seal the other side of the document and trim the edges. Made from acid-free and archival safe material, you’ll be able to preserve and protect documents, diplomas, artwork, photos, collector cards, signs, homemade crafts, stickers and more. You can even turn your laminated sheets into a dry erase board and use a dry erase marker to make notes on them directly. Whether you’re a business professional, teacher, student, hobbyist or collector, you’ll love how easy-to-use and inexpensive Avery lamination sheets are for all your quick laminating projects. Item comes with a total of 2 self-laminate sheets.
